entry.source: 〉 Two Casualries are here.{F801}They appear to be brothers...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 Two Casualries are here.{F801}They appear to be brothers...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Younger Brother\0{F87A,35}{F813,1,403033}Thank you for deciding to accept our{F801}request, Blessed Samurai.{F801}{F802}Our sister is suffering from some{F801}kind of lung ailment.{F801}{F802}It is a serious illness, and the{F801}doctor says that he cannot do much{F801}for her.{F801}{F802}But the doctor has also told us that{F801}a magical remedy may be found in the{F801}land of the Unclean Ones...{F801}{F802}If we can obtain this remedy, there{F801}may be a chance that we can cure{F801}her of her illness.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Younger Brother\0{F87A,35}{F813,1,403033}Thank you for deciding to accept our{F801}request, Blessed Samurai.{F801}{F802}Our sister is suffering from some{F801}kind of lung ailment.{F801}{F802}It is a serious illness, and the{F801}doctor says that he cannot do much{F801}for her.{F801}{F802}But the doctor has also told us that{F801}a magical remedy may be found in the{F801}land of the Unclean Ones...{F801}{F802}If we can obtain this remedy, there{F801}may be a chance that we can cure{F801}her of her illness.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Younger Brother\0{F87A,35}{F813,1,403042}I have read a book containing a{F801}description of this remedy.{F801}{F802}According to this book, our sister's{F801}illness is already in its final{F801}stage... Things are not looking well.{F801}{F802}Please, this is our last hope.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Younger Brother\0{F87A,35}{F813,1,403042}I have read a book containing a{F801}description of this remedy.{F801}{F802}According to this book, our sister's{F801}illness is already in its final{F801}stage... Things are not looking well.{F801}{F802}Please, this is our last hope.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Younger Brother\0{F87A,35}Please, would you go into the land{F801}of the Unclean Ones and find this{F801}remedy for our sister?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Younger Brother\0{F87A,35}Please, would you go into the land{F801}of the Unclean Ones and find this{F801}remedy for our sister?{F801}

entry.source: "I accept."{F801}"No."{F801}
entry.target: "I accept."{F801}"No."{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Younger Brother\0{F87A,35}{F813,1,403033}Thank you very much.{F801}{F802}The book I read said that there was a{F801}large hospital in a place called{F801}{F804,5}Tsukiji.{F804,0}{F801}{F802}Perhaps you will be able to find the{F801}remedy there. Please, help us save{F801}our sister.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Younger Brother\0{F87A,35}{F813,1,403033}Thank you very much.{F801}{F802}The book I read said that there was a{F801}large hospital in a place called{F801}{F804,5}Tsukiji.{F804,0}{F801}{F802}Perhaps you will be able to find the{F801}remedy there. Please, help us save{F801}our sister.{F801}

entry.target: 〉 The brothers leave...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Older Brother\0{F87A,34}{F813,1,403202}...A moment, please.{F801}{F802}May I ask you something?{F801}{F802}My brother just asked you to find{F801}that medicine.{F801}{F802}...Do you think what you find will{F801}be able to help our sister?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Older Brother\0{F87A,34}{F813,1,403202}...A moment, please.{F801}{F802}May I ask you something?{F801}{F802}My brother just asked you to find{F801}that medicine.{F801}{F802}...Do you think what you find will{F801}be able to help our sister?{F801}

entry.source: "I believe so."{F801}"I have my doubts."{F801}
entry.target: "I believe so."{F801}"I have my doubts."{F801}

entry.target: {F812}Older Brother\0{F87A,34}{F813,1,403203}...I want to believe that, too.{F801}{F802}But I read my brother's book... and{F801}the remedy has little effect when the{F801}disease is in its final stage.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Older Brother\0{F87A,34}{F813,1,403212}...You too, then.{F801}{F802}I've read my brother's book... and{F801}the remedy has little effect when the{F801}disease is in its final stage.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Older Brother\0{F87A,34}{F813,1,403212}...You too, then.{F801}{F802}I've read my brother's book... and{F801}the remedy has little effect when the{F801}disease is in its final stage.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Older Brother\0{F87A,34}{F813,1,403242}My sister is in extremely poor{F801}health. I honestly have little faith{F801}in any medicine's ability to save her.{F801}{F802}I think anything we do to help at{F801}this point will only prolong her{F801}suffering.{F801}{F802}...So I'd rather let her die{F801}peacefully.{F801}{F802}I'm pretty sure my brother has begun{F801}to realize this on his own.{F801}{F802}But... He is far too kind to allow{F801}himself to say as much.{F801}{F802}......{F801}{F802}If you do bring us the remedy, then{F801}I will gladly accept it.{F801}{F802}But... If you have the choice, I'd{F801}like you to bring back something{F801}that will let her die in peace.{F801}{F802}...Please.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Older Brother\0{F87A,34}{F813,1,403242}My sister is in extremely poor{F801}health. I honestly have little faith{F801}in any medicine's ability to save her.{F801}{F802}I think anything we do to help at{F801}this point will only prolong her{F801}suffering.{F801}{F802}...So I'd rather let her die{F801}peacefully.{F801}{F802}I'm pretty sure my brother has begun{F801}to realize this on his own.{F801}{F802}But... He is far too kind to allow{F801}himself to say as much.{F801}{F802}......{F801}{F802}If you do bring us the remedy, then{F801}I will gladly accept it.{F801}{F802}But... If you have the choice, I'd{F801}like you to bring back something{F801}that will let her die in peace.{F801}{F802}...Please.{F801}

entry.target: {F812}Younger Brother\0{F87A,35}{F813,1,403023}...Why?{F801}{F802}......{F801}{F802}...I understand. I'm sorry. I presume{F801}too much in asking a Samurai to help{F801}us.{F801}{F802}If you do ever change you mind,{F801}please help my sister.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Older Brother\0{F87A,34}{F813,1,403242}......{F801}{F802}The fact that you brought the cure{F801}means that you want us to take our{F801}chances with this.{F801}{F802}Very well. It's not as if I want my{F801}sister to die.{F801}{F802}I'm sure she wants to get better{F801}and for us to live as a happy family{F801}again.{F801}{F802}I'll pray that she gets better.{F801}Just like my brother.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Older Brother\0{F87A,34}{F813,1,403212}...We both know there's no hope.{F801}She's far too weak now, and there's{F801}no way she can possibly recover.{F801}{F802}She's been suffering for so long now.{F801}She's... barely even conscious.{F801}{F802}You've already realized that,{F801}haven't you?{F801}{F802}...It's enough already.{F801}We have to... let her go.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Older Brother\0{F87A,34}{F813,1,403212}...We both know there's no hope.{F801}She's far too weak now, and there's{F801}no way she can possibly recover.{F801}{F802}She's been suffering for so long now.{F801}She's... barely even conscious.{F801}{F802}You've already realized that,{F801}haven't you?{F801}{F802}...It's enough already.{F801}We have to... let her go.{F801}

We will come to a{F801}decision after a long discussion.{F801}{F802}Thank you for bringing us these{F801}medicines.{F801}
